org.kepow.economysim

Class MenuButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepow.economysim.MenuButton
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MenuBuyItemButton

    public class MenuButton
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent a button placeable in a menu.
    Author:
    Thomas Churchman
